meanings.definition: A protein that transfers electrons in biological systems.
meanings.sent1: The ferredoxin helped move electrons in the cell.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study how ferredoxin functions in living organisms.
meanings.sent3: The ferredoxin and its electron dance made the cell party lively.
meanings.sent4: Like a tiny electron courier, ferredoxin swiftly delivers its cargo.
meanings.sent5: In the intricate world of cells, ferredoxin is the electron messenger.

meanings.definition: A molecule involved in electron transport in cells.
meanings.sent1: Cells rely on ferredoxin to transport electrons efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The role of ferredoxin in cellular processes is crucial.
meanings.sent3: When ferredoxin takes a break, the electrons go on strike!
meanings.sent4: In the bustling city of the cell, ferredoxin is the busy electron taxi.
meanings.sent5: Ferredoxin acts as a reliable shuttle, carrying electrons to their destination.
